data.name: Description
data.detail: This original pattern was utilised in the aborted construction of an intended high speed trade network connecting the Ferrous Range with the Central Wastes.

data.name: Systems
data.detail:
Heavy Duty Mining Rig
AFF Coolant Foam
Dozer Blades
Escape Hatch
Grav Assisted Cargo Bay
High Gain Antenna
Prawn Sifter

data.name: Modules
data.detail:
Auto-Repair Droid
Comms Module
Navigation Module
Thermal Optics

data.name: Description
data.detail: Developed for military use, this pattern was designed for a hostile takeover of a competitors arco. Drilling through the foundations to deliver a deadly payload of firepower while supporting a strike team.

data.name: Systems
data.detail:
Mole Torpedo
30mm Autocannon ×2
Ejection System
Multi-Phase Shield

data.name: Modules
data.detail:
Advanced Targeting
Comms Module
Multi-Optics

data.name: Description
data.detail: It is rumoured that each of the ‘Big Five’ corporate council members have one of these ready to be deployed in the event their arco is attacked to ensure mutual annihilation with their attackers.

data.name: Systems
data.detail:
N15 Fat Boy
Mole Torpedo
Multi-Phase Shield
Radomes

data.name: Modules
data.detail:
Comms Module
Encrypted Comms
Laser Guidance
Navigation Module
Thermal Optics

data.name: Description
data.detail: A mobile bastion bristling with an array of weapons that it brings to bear as the lynchpin of the Evantis battle line.

data.name: Systems
data.detail:
.50 Cal Machine Gun ×6
Red Laser × 3
30mm Autocannon × 2
Ejector Pod
Locomotion System

data.name: Modules
data.detail:
Alpha Strike Module
Comms Module
Multi-Targeter
Offensive Protocols
Reactor Safety Protocols

data.name: Description
data.detail: These blueprints were found on a successful salvager infiltration of a Sakura black site. The Mech Pattern was a covert collaboration between Evantis and Sakura to design a Mech that could mount two Experimental Particle Beam Cannons. May the hammer guide whoever encounters this in the field.

data.name: Systems
data.detail:
Experimental Particle Beam Cannon × 2
Matter Phase Shield
Nanite Repair Arm
Stabilising Locomotion System

data.name: Modules
data.detail:
Advanced Targeting
Comms Module
Coolant Flow Manifold
Firewall
Reactor Safety Protocols

data.name: Description
data.detail: The original Leviathan build mounted with the pinnacle of Evantis ballistic tech- nology. Recorded as having 41 confirmed kills during the Battle of the Ice Shelf where TDA forces were pushed back to the brink of the Frozen Gulf.

data.name: Systems
data.detail:
120mm Heavy Autocannon × 2
Stabilising Locomotion System
Ejector Pod

data.name: Modules
data.detail:
Advanced Targeting
Alpha Strike Module
Comms Module
Coolant Flow Manifold
Firewall

data.name: Description
data.detail: Beloved by thrill-seekers, the Shaitan’s intense speeds and manoeuvrability are an exquisite experience for those riding stick, and especially for those riding shotgun.
